name: WordStrike
description:
The game uses Photon network to establish connection with other player. The rooms can be joined by up to 4 players. More players in room increases difficulty by giving less time to translate words from polish to english. The game has 2 modes. One of them increases the difficulty by adding turrets that shoot freezing projectiles. Game can be restarted after loss or after defeating the enemy from the same room.

This game is my first project that I've completed. Currently the Photon servers can host 20 concurrent users.
